member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkRange.Max
member.summary: Maximum Framework

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkRange.IncludeMin

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkRange.IncludeMax
member.summary: Maximum version inclusiveness.

member.summary: Framework Identifier of both the Min and Max

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer
member.summary: Reduces a list of frameworks into the smallest set of frameworks required.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a FrameworkReducer using the default framework mappings.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.#ctor(NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider,NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkCompatibilityProvider)
member.summary: Creates a FrameworkReducer using custom framework mappings.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.GetNearest(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework})
member.summary: Returns the nearest matching framework that is compatible.
member.returns: Nearest compatible framework. If no frameworks are compatible null is returned.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.Reduce(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework})
member.summary: Remove duplicates found in the equivalence mappings.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.ReduceUpwards(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework})
member.summary: Reduce to the highest framework Ex: net45, net403, net40 -> net45

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.ReduceDownwards(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework})
member.summary: Reduce to the lowest framework Ex: net45, net403, net40 -> net40

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.ExplodePortableFrameworks(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create lookup of the given PCLs to their actual frameworks

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.ExplodePortableFramework(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,System.Boolean)
member.summary: portable-net45+win8 -> net45, win8

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.GetBestPCL(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework})
member.summary: Order PCLs when there is no other way to decide.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkReducer.IsBetterPCL(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework)
member.summary: Sort PCLs using these criteria 1. Lowest number of frameworks (highest surface area) wins first 2. Profile with the highest version numbers wins next 3. String compare is used as a last resort

member.summary: True if this framework matches for all versions. Ex: net

member.summary: True if this framework was invalid or unknown. This framework is only compatible with Any and Agnostic.

member.summary: True if this framework is non-specific. Always compatible.

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework.IsAny
member.summary: True if this is the any framework. Always compatible.

member.summary: True if this framework is real and not one of the special identifiers.

member.summary: An unknown or invalid framework

member.summary: Primary framework range or project target framework that supports the SuppportedFrameworkRange

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkPrecedenceSorter
member.summary: Sorts frameworks according to the framework mappings

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFrameworkFullComparer
member.summary: A case insensitive compare of the framework, version, and profile

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFrameworkNameComparer
member.summary: A case insensitive compare of the framework name only

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFrameworkSorter
member.summary: Sorts NuGet Frameworks in a consistent way for package readers. The order is not particularly useful here beyond making things deterministic since it compares completely different frameworks.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkCompatibilityProvider.IsCompatible(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework)
member.summary: Ex: IsCompatible(net45, net40) -> true Ex: IsCompatible(net40, net45) -> false
member.param: Library framework that is going to be installed

member.name: T:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings
member.summary: A raw list of framework mappings. These are indexed by the framework name provider and in most cases all mappings are mirrored so that the IFrameworkMappings implementation only needs to provide the minimum amount of mappings.

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.IdentifierSynonyms
member.summary: Synonym -> Identifier Ex: NET Framework -> .NET Framework

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.IdentifierShortNames
member.summary: Ex: .NET Framework -> net

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.EquivalentProfiles
member.summary: Framework, EquivalentProfile1, EquivalentProfile2 Ex: Silverlight, WindowsPhone71, WindowsPhone

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.SubSetFrameworks
member.summary: Frameworks which are subsets of others. Ex: .NETCore -> .NET Everything in .NETCore maps to .NET and is one way compatible. Version numbers follow the same format.

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.CompatibilityMappings
member.summary: Additional framework compatibility rules beyond name and version matching. Ex: .NETFramework -supports-> Native

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.FrameworkPrecedence
member.summary: Ordered list of framework identifiers. The first framework in the list will be preferred over other framework identifiers. This is enable better tie breaking in scenarios where legacy frameworks are equivalently compatible to a new framework. Example: UAP10.0 -> win81, wpa81

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.ShortNameReplacements
member.summary: Rewrite folder short names to the given value. Ex: dotnet50 -> dotnet

member.name: P:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkMappings.FullNameReplacements
member.summary: Rewrite full framework names to the given value. Ex: .NETPlatform,Version=v0.0 -> .NETPlatform,Version=v5.0

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetIdentifier(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns the official framework identifier for an alias or short name.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetShortIdentifier(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gives the short name used for folders in NuGet

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetProfile(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get the official profile name from the short name.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetShortProfile(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Returns the shortened version of the profile name.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetVersion(System.String,System.Version@)
member.summary: Parses a version string using single digit rules if no dots exist

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.GetVersionString(System.Version)
member.summary: Returns a shortened version. If all digits are single digits no dots will be used.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetPortableProfile(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Looks up the portable profile number based on the framework list.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetPortableFrameworks(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Returns the frameworks based on a portable profile number.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetPortableFrameworks(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Returns the frameworks based on a portable profile number.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetPortableFrameworks(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Returns the frameworks based on a profile string. Profile can be either the number in format: Profile=7, or the shortened NuGet version: net45+win8

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetPortableFrameworks(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Parses a shortened portable framework profile list. Ex: net45+win8

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetEquivalentFrameworks(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Returns a list of all possible substitutions where the framework name have equivalents. Ex: sl3 -> wp8

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetEquivalentFrameworks(NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkRange,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework}@)
member.summary: Gives all substitutions for a framework range.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetCompatibilityMappings(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{NuGet.Frameworks.FrameworkRange}@)
member.summary: Returns ranges of frameworks that are known to be supported by the given framework. Ex: net45 -> native

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.TryGetSubSetFrameworks(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Returns all sub sets of the given framework. Ex: .NETFramework -> .NETCore These will have the same version, but a different framework

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.CompareFrameworks(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework,NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework)
member.summary: Attempts order and prefer one framework over the other based on framework preference rules.
member.returns: 0 if no order can be determined, -1 if the first framework is preferred.

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.GetShortNameReplacement(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework)
member.summary: Returns folder short names rewrites. Ex: dotnet50 -> dotnet

member.name: M:NuGet.Frameworks.IFrameworkNameProvider.GetFullNameReplacement(NuGet.Frameworks.NuGetFramework)
member.summary: Returns full name rewrites. Ex: .NETPlatform,Version=v0.0 -> .NETPlatform,Version=v5.0
